lines.text: Either do more coke or more booze or less! But give me what I need!
We could talk about this for decades.
Why did God create men? Because vibrators can't mow the lawn.

"I don't know if I should slip your throat or push you off the building!" I would have done anything, anything for him. All of a sudden he just broke down and started crying. He ran away and I put my clothes back on and I walked home.
